title: Ep 559 | Jase’s Blunderbuss Blunder, Phil’s Exorcism & Gangsters of the Bible
description:
Jase tells a really embarrassing story about showing up at a duck hunt with an empty shotgun, and when he turns to his trusty neighbors for help... Phil tells of the time he was approached by a spiritually afflicted person. Al discusses the ironic profession that biblical gangsters held. Jase discusses the sin of pride and how it seeks to blind even the believer, and Al explains how your own righteousness can get in the way of seeing who Jesus really is!

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Go to https://HelixSleep.com/UNASHAMED to get $200 off any mattress order AND get 2 free pillows!
